price: E vingamo-nos deles; então olha como foi o fim dos desmentidores!
arabic: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fa-intaqamnā min'hum fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
